def_cn: 坚持;坚决认为(或主张、要求)
def_en: If you insist that something should be done, you say so very firmly and refuse to give in about it. If you insist on something, you say firmly that it must be done or provided.
If you insist that something is the case, you say so very firmly and refuse to say otherwise, even though other people do not believe you.
